content: Pre Appointment
Data Protection Licence applied for and permissions
Business Card created by Acquisition Co-ordinator, and passed to AHOT

notes: Supporting docs include P60, ID, redundancy letter etc.

content: PDM (Transition) Assignment (AHOT forwards the Business Card)
Target Appointment Date established
Complete Transition & Establishment Timeline and conduct meeting prep
Initial Meeting with PDM(T)

notes: Discuss New Recruit Timeline & role of transition
Inform Recuit of all workshop dates pre and post appointment

content: Set recruit up on My Development
notes: Email Ben Mutter in Partnership Development

content: Send copy of Recruit Contract to Legal for consideration
PDM(T) Consultancy Meeting - Four Pillars
notes: Discuss use of Linkedin/other marketing material

content: Discuss content of legal contract with recruit (DPA implication discussions)
notes: Transition Meeting Ex-employed advisers form - signed by all parties

content: Commence filling in NPPR
Double check trading style is correct (Sole Trader, Ltd Company, LLP)
notes: Factsheet:  SJP4314 - Types of trading Entity for new SJP Partners

content: Received Marketing approval of trading name
Buy Domain name for website & email / Gain Mktg Dept Agreement
notes: Siteset flow chart for website approval

content: Double check Data Protection Licence applied for and permissions
Complete Marketing Fact Find if relevant(Identifying key relationships)
Progress Review Meeting
Partner set up SJP website templates
notes: Your Guide to St. James’s Place Partner Websites, contact Siteset
Your St. James’s Place Partner website copy

content: Check Business Stationery is 100% accurate. Confirm to AC with delivery details.
Contact PRISM about IT Infrastructure
IT equipment purchased by Partner
notes: Refer to guidance notes on Intranet.

content: Stationery confirmed & ready for delivery to Location / Home
notes: Office admin to order "Starter Pack" via Connect

content: Check if any recruitment paperwork is outstanding
Hold review meeting to check everything ready for Appointment
Check Form A submitted to FCA Approved
Check website ready for launch
notes: Email with example build to be approved.

content: Book training session with BPTM for post appointment
DPL received from ICO
Business Plan reviewed as part of 4 Pillars consultancy meetings
WM@SJP pre-brief meeting completed
Attend WM@SJP Course
Initial Location Meeting with HOB
NPPR completed and sent to Partnership Accredatation
Advice & Sales Process workshop attended

notes: Roleplay of fact find/ present meeting completed - PDM(T) discretion

content: Pass all core exams
Pass Certificate level accreditations to include Diploma Savings and Investments
Pass all Diploma exams - if required
Pass Advanced Diploma exams - if required
Book client meetings for observation
Check target Completion Date for CAS
Office Admin ordered Starter Pack  Partner Literature
Book SWIFT course for appiontment month
On Appointment
Once NPPR approved, send Appointment Memo to Recruit with Licences & Authorisations
notes: Appointment Memo and email from T&C

content: HOB Announced Appointment to Location
Hold 121 post Appointment Date
Encryption declaration completed
Fobs/passwords received for SJP email & intranet from PRISM
Contact PRISM to book engineer for Encryption
Scheduled first Client Meeting (CM) to be observed by PDM(T)
Post Appointment
Compliance Information & Procedures training attended
Discuss PROMS - if relevant
Introduced to Partner Mentor (if relevant)
Quality of Documentation Training attended
Attended Business processing with SWIFT workshop.
Business Submission, process training and Intranet overview
Partner Summary Overview - AP+
Client Fact Find Meeting accompanied observation(s) completed
notes: Observation aide - SD5 - Partner S&D Logs

content: Confirmation of unaccompanied client fact find meetings sent to Recuit
Client Presentation Meeting observation(s) completed
notes: Observation aide - SD5 - Partner S&D Logs

content: Confirmation of unaccompanied Client Presentation Meetings sent to Recruit
Schedule 121's - PDM location involvement as required
Book Investment Development Day (if relevant)
Attend Business Assurance 'How to' Replacement Workshops - if relevant
Pass Investment Replacement Accreditation (if relevant)
Location Meeting #2 with HOB
Update NPPR with Skills Assessments
Competence evidenced
Competence minimum of 3 pieces of business to acceptable standards
CAS Nomination
Up date NPPR with evidence of CAS nomination and send to AHOT for approval
Once approval received from AHOT - send to Partnership Accreditation for signoff
Once approved - send CAS letter to Recruit confirming CAS nomination
Change Nominated Supervisor on corporate database following handover to PDM
